# Dataset Overview

The dataset contains detailed NHL skater-level performance statistics across shifts, expected goals, Corsi metrics, Fenwick metrics, on-ice/off-ice performance, and special teams performance.

This dataset enables:

- Micro-shiftâ€“level analytics  
- Expected goals modeling  
- Special teams evaluation  
- Advanced on/off impact estimation  

---

## Key Statistics Included

- **xGoalsForAfterShifts**
- **xGoalsAgainstAfterShifts**
- **Corsi After Shifts**
- **Fenwick After Shifts**
- **Power Play metrics**
- **Penalty Kill metrics**
- **TOI (Time on Ice)**
- **Shift counts**
- **Player roles & positions**

---

## Why This Dataset is Suitable

This dataset supports complex predictive analytics, such as:

- Non-linear decay modeling (RQ1)
- Composite scoring for special teams roles (RQ2)
- Player impact segregation using on/off metrics (RQ3)
